name: The Car Crash
description: Christopher relapses and crashes the car with Tony inside.
context: Christopher Moltisanti, your protégé and nephew, has relapsed on heroin and cocaine. While driving high on Route 1, he swerved off the road and flipped the Escalade. You're injured but alive—bruised ribs, cuts on your face. Christopher is pinned behind the wheel, blood gurgling from his mouth and nose. He can barely breathe. No one else is around. Christopher has been to rehab multiple times. He's been clean for stretches, then relapses. He's your nephew, the closest thing you have to a son in the business.
prompt: Christopher is pinned in the wreckage, struggling to breathe. You're alone on an empty road. What do you do?
stakes: If you call 911, he might survive. If you don't, he dies in the wreck.
